mapper.update:
update ACT_RU_TASK
REV_ = #{rev,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXECUTION_ID_ = #{executionId,jdbcType=OTHER},
PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId,jdbcType=OTHER},
PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId,jdbcType=OTHER},
NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=OTHER},
PARENT_TASK_ID_ = #{parentTaskId,jdbcType=OTHER},
DESCRIPTION_ = #{description,jdbcType=OTHER},
TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDefKey,jdbcType=OTHER},
OWNER_ = #{owner,jdbcType=OTHER},
ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee,jdbcType=OTHER},
DELEGATION_ = #{delegation,jdbcType=OTHER},
PRIORITY_ = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME_ = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DUE_DATE_ = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CATEGORY_ = #{category,jdbcType=OTHER},
SUSPENSION_STATE_ = #{suspensionState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId,jdbcType=OTHER},
FORM_KEY_ = #{formKey,jdbcType=OTHER},
CLAIM_TIME_ = #{claimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}

update ACT_RU_TASK set REV_ = #{rev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXECUTION_ID_ = #{executionId,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId,jdbcType=OTHER}, NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=OTHER}, PARENT_TASK_ID_ = #{parentTaskId,jdbcType=OTHER}, DESCRIPTION_ = #{description,jdbcType=OTHER}, TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDefKey,jdbcType=OTHER}, OWNER_ = #{owner,jdbcType=OTHER}, ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee,jdbcType=OTHER}, DELEGATION_ = #{delegation,jdbcType=OTHER}, PRIORITY_ = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME_ = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DUE_DATE_ = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CATEGORY_ = #{category,jdbcType=OTHER}, SUSPENSION_STATE_ = #{suspensionState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId,jdbcType=OTHER}, FORM_KEY_ = #{formKey,jdbcType=OTHER}, CLAIM_TIME_ = #{claimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select:
select rt.ID_,rt.NAME_,br.ACTIV_ID, br.BUS_ID, br.BUS_TYPE, br.C_TIME, br.C_USER, br.ACTIV_STATUS, br.STATUS,ri.group_id_ from ACT_RU_TASK rt, A_bus_act_rel br,act_ru_identitylink ri,a_agent a
rt.EXECUTION_ID_ = br.activ_id and ri.task_id_ = rt.id_ and br.agent_id = a.id

select distinct rt.ID_,rt.NAME_,br.ACTIV_ID, br.BUS_ID, br.BUS_TYPE, br.C_TIME, br.C_USER, br.ACTIV_STATUS, br.STATUS,ri.group_id_ from ACT_RU_TASK rt, A_bus_act_rel br,act_ru_identitylink ri where rt.EXECUTION_ID_ = br.activ_id and ri.task_id_ = rt.id_ and br.AGENT_NAME like concat(concat('%',','), '%')
and ri.group_id_ = #{params.group}
mapper.sql: rt.ID_,rt.NAME_,br.ACTIV_ID, br.BUS_ID, br.BUS_TYPE, to_char(br.C_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') C_TIME, br.C_USER,br.ACTIV_STATUS, br.STATUS,ri.group_id_, br.agent_id,br.agent_name,br.net_in_bus_type

(select
from ACT_RU_TASK rt, A_bus_act_rel br,act_ru_identitylink ri,a_agent a
rt.EXECUTION_ID_ = br.activ_id and ri.task_id_ = rt.id_ and br.agent_id = a.id
and NET_IN_BUS_TYPE is null
UNION select
from ACT_RU_TASK rt, A_bus_act_rel br,act_ru_identitylink ri,a_agent a
rt.EXECUTION_ID_ = br.activ_id and ri.task_id_ = rt.id_ and br.agent_id = a.id
and NET_IN_BUS_TYPE is not null
and
#{netInUrl}
AND 1 = -1
) ORDER by C_TIME desc
